abilityEffect.en: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your discard pile for a [W] Energy card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. This power can't be used if Starmie is affected by a Special Condition.

effect.en: If Starmie and the Defending Pok√©mon have the same amount of Energy attached to them, remove 4 damage counters from Starmie.
Starmie can't attack during your next turn.
